description:
Temporary approval of details relating to planning condition AG16 of P052891 which requires 40 coach parking spaces to be provided within the Emirates Stadium or outside the stadium as previously agreed by the Council. The proposal for football (soccer) matches only is that coach parking shall be provided for the 2012/13 and 2013/14 football seasons at the following locations in order of priority:
• Queensland Road
• Sobell Centre
• Hornsey Street
• Drayton Park
• Finsbury Park
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Coach parking at Hornsey Street and Drayton park shall be limited to not more than twice per year for each location unless increased usage is required for safety and/or security reasons by the Metropolitan Police Service in consultation with the London Borough of Islington.

REASON: So that this short-term parking arrangement maintains an appropriate balance between the need to provide for coach parking as an alternative to car based transport to the Emirates Stadium (in accordance with the NPPF, London Plan policies 1.1, 2.9, 3.2, 4.6, Islington Core Strategy CS10 and Islington UDP saved policies T18, IMP14 and V1) balanced with consideration for the protection of residential amenity (in accordance with London Plan policies 7.14 and 7.15, Islington Core Strategy policy CS8 and Islington UDP saved policies ENV12, ENV16 and ENV 17).
